descriptionHtml:
Gives you 100 to all skills. Gives you all the perks. Gives you tons of gold. Gives you MAX health/stamina/magicka for a level 81. Gives you tons of dragon souls. Gives you very high carry weight. It also gives you all the shouts.

1.Unzip in main skyrim folder.
2.Put txt file in skyrim folder.
3.Type in ingame console: bat addcommands

I made this since I couldn't find a instant setup bat file for characters on nexus only separate ones.
author: Joshua Skidds
